task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 50°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the top of the building to estimate its full height, so I will look up.
I still can't see the very top of the building, so I need to look up even more to get a full view for my height estimation.
I can now see the top of the building, and by counting the visible floors (approximately 12) and assuming a standard height of 3.5 meters per floor, I can estimate the total height.
